properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_ITEMBOARD ( BOARD_NO, MEM_NO, IBOARD_TITLE, IBOARD_CONTENT, IBOARD_POST_DATE, IBOARD_MODIFY_DATE, STATUS, PRICE ) VALUES ( SEQ_IB_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y', ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO, CATEGORY_NO, REF_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, MODIFIED_NAME, SAVE_PATH, UPLOAD_DATE, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_AT_NO.NEXTVAL, 20, SEQ_IB_NO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, 'Y' )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ITEMBOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, MEM_NAME, IBOARD_TITLE, IBOARD_CONTENT, IBOARD_POST_DATE, IBOARD_MODIFY_DATE, COUNT, PRICE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, MEM_NAME, IBOARD_TITLE, IBOARD_CONTENT, IBOARD_POST_DATE, IBOARD_MODIFY_DATE, COUNT, PRICE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, MEM_NAME, IBOARD_TITLE, IBOARD_CONTENT, IBOARD_POST_DATE, IBOARD_MODIFY_DATE, COUNT, PRICE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM TB_ITEMBOARD IB JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE IB.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY IBOARD_POST_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
